original_text: And he had greaves of brass upon his legs, and a target of brass between his shoulders.
korean_text: 그의 다리에는 놋 각반을 쳤고 어깨 사이에는 놋 단창을 메었으니

sentences.original_text: And he had greaves of brass upon his legs
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 다리에 놋쇠 정갈이를 신고 있었으며

sentences.original_text: and a target of brass between his shoulders
sentences.korean_translation: 어깨 사이에 놋쇠 방패를 지니고 있었더라
